title: How to clear your passwords in Google Chrome and turn off autofill
content:
There are multiple different services available that allow you to save your passwords, including Google Chrome. If you happen to use one of the many other password-saving programs out there, you probably don’t need to use Chrome’s version. This guide will help you clear all your passwords to essentially turn off Chrome’s autofill.

more…

The post How to clear your passwords in Google Chrome and turn off autofill appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Need to turn off password autofill in Google Chrome? This guide will help you clear your saved passwords in Chrome to disable autofill.
